p:
All commercial cells used in this study were detailed in
Supplement Table 2 . Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium (DMEM; Gibco, Grand island, NY, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco), 100 U/mL penicillin and 100 mg/mL streptomycin (Gibco) were used to culture cell. Cells were cultured at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2.
